channel.title: Hey what is the most borinest stat in runescape
channel.description:
mine is minning ive got 90 minning toke me ages....but i get rune rocks :) oo and 89 smithing there the most borning stat i hate but meh :)
just tell me urs and what lvl is it ..:)

item.title: Hey what is the most borinest stat in runescape
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

not even the most boring one would have to be prayer. Sure it’s really helpful and u get cb lvls and such but its so dam boring click to kill the thing then bury the bones or buy them then always click so much and open the bank over and over. I dont understand how u people get it so high. i just used meh autoer to 52

item.title: Hey what is the most borinest stat in runescape
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

Whiteyboy5:

Farming isn’t the worst, 'cause you can do it in the background of fletching or alching. RuneCrafting is the worst, so repetetive and such a slow exp rate.

RuneCrafting is easyyyyyyy!!!
I got it from 9 to 45 in like 2 hours by being an air crafter at world 16…
On the other hand, it took me 30 minutes to get level 3 farming…

Read full topic
item.source: Hey what is the most borinest stat in runescape

item.title: Hey what is the most borinest stat in runescape
item.dc:creator: @Hypocrite Hypocrite
item.description:
@Hypocrite wrote:

[quote=“Whiteyboy5, post:36, topic:69217”][quote author=halo1231 link=topic=101697.msg1043400#msg1043400 date=1174722584]
Im not sure about the member ones but my friend has a member account and i go on it sometimes…
Im guessing constrution…
My friend wasted 100k and only got to lvl 11
[/quote]
Definitley not construction, you can get it all for FREE if you are self-sufficient and make your own materials[/quote]

Yeah, that’s if you make the little ponds 'till level 99. Any decent way to train costs the money of making logs into planks even if you WC them yourself.

item.title: Hey what is the most borinest stat in runescape
item.dc:creator: @Hypocrite Hypocrite
item.description:
@Hypocrite wrote:

Gotta say slayer.

Just hit 2m exp, been going it it for a LONG time…

You average 200 exp a minute at best, and that doesn’t count the time it takes to switch assignments, Burthorpe bad tasks, get everything around, do clue scrolls, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey what is the most borinest stat in runescape
item.dc:creator: @apzrman apzrman
item.description:
@apzrman wrote:

[quote=“halo1231, post:29, topic:69217”]Smithing is easy to me…
I just sit by a mine field and mine the ores i need…
Then when my inventory is full i store it in the bank and keep doing that till i got a ton of ores…
then i go to fally and i smelt all my ores into bars…
then i got to the dwarf person by fally and smith it there…
I go to the fally mine area… The dwarf mine place…[/quote]
yeah, i forgot about that dwarf smith guy. my trip was always:
go to the dwarf mines, lumby furnace, varrock smithing. so after a while i just quit doing mining/smithing

Read full topic

item.title: Hey what is the most borinest stat in runescape
item.dc:creator: @halo1231 halo1231
item.description:
@halo1231 wrote:

Smithing is easy to me…
I just sit by a mine field and mine the ores i need…
Then when my inventory is full i store it in the bank and keep doing that till i got a ton of ores…
then i go to fally and i smelt all my ores into bars…
then i got to the dwarf person by fally and smith it there…
I go to the fally mine area… The dwarf mine place…

Read full topic

item.title: Hey what is the most borinest stat in runescape
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

I would have to say slayer. I know its probably among the top 5 easiest skills to raise, but still, theres too much walking, too much preparation, etc., etc… And you probably couldnt do it with you’re friends, because theres a high chance you wont get the same task, unlike most other skills, where you can do it with you’re friends.

Read full topic
